org.cps.api.request
Class CPSUpdateRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.cps.api.CPSRequest
      org.cps.api.request.CPSModifyRequest
          org.cps.api.request.CPSUpdateRequest

public class CPSUpdateRequest
extends CPSModifyRequest

The CPSUpdateRequest class is a wrapper for the CPSModifyRequest class for the update command

See Also:
CPSModifyResponse
